casebody.data:
BANK OF AMERICA CORPORATION, et al., Petitioners,
v.
CITY OF MIAMI, FLORIDA ; No. 19-675. Supreme Court of the United States. March 2, 2020

The Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit is granted. The judgment of the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit is vacated as moot. See United States v. Munsingwear, Inc. , 340 U.S. 36, 71 S.Ct. 104, 95 L.Ed. 36 (1950)
